alert.note: Alert for Nez Perce (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 09 at 5:33PM MDT until June 11 at 5:34AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by previous rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of North Central Idaho, including the following county, Nez Perce. Portions of Southeast Washington, including the following county, Asotin. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 433 PM PDT, Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewiston, Clarkston, Clarkston Heights-Vineland, West Clarkston-Highland, Asotin, Clarkston Heights and Jerry. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
